columns.name: id
columns.description: The fully qualified ID for the management group.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the management group.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the management group.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The friendly name of the management group.

columns.name: tenant_id
columns.description: The AAD Tenant ID associated with the management group.

columns.name: children
columns.description: The list of children of the management group.

columns.name: updated_by
columns.description: The identity of the principal or process that updated the management group.

columns.name: updated_time
columns.description: The date and time when this management group was last updated.

columns.name: version
columns.description: The version number of the management group.
